name: @robohub/inference-server-client
description: TypeScript client for LeRobot Arena Inference Server - ACT model inference and session management

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir ./dist --target bun --format esm --sourcemap && bunx tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --outDir ./dist/temp && cp -r ./dist/temp/src/* ./dist/ && rm -rf ./dist/temp
scripts.export-openapi: cd .. && uv run python -m inference_server.export_openapi --output client/openapi.json
scripts.generate: bun run export-openapi && bun run generate-client
scripts.prebuild: bun run clean && bun run generate

author: Julien Blanchon
